events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund due to it not fitting as expected.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request for a recent order due to size issues.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and facilitate the process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
My order number is 4536721. I havenâ€™t returned the jacket yet and would appreciate guidance on the return process.
Thank you for the information. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the jacket back for a full refund.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
I have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund after returning your jacket. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you for your help and clear communication throughout the process.
We are glad your refund has been completed. Closing this case now and please contact us anytime if you need further support.
